title: Chagos Islands debate delayed as Tories call for halt to bill
full_text: Chagos Islands debate delayed as Tories call for halt to bill. The legislation was due to be debated in Lords on Monday.. Leila Nathoo,Political correspondent A bill aimed at enshrining in law the government's Chagos deal will not be debated in the Lords as previously planned.
